Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Staff is supper friendly and well managed.

The food is ok. â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great pastries and breakfasts - friendly service and homemade jams and curds. Well worth a visit and average price.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Very nice place with a great light inside.
Friendly staff.
I mainly go there for the scones and fresh juices. Love them!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Staff is extra friendly and the food is good! Highly recommend it.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very cool and charming place to get breakfast. A variety of options, from sweets to egg/bread dishes. They also serve lunch dishes, such as sandwiches and soups. They also make their own jam. I loved their passion fruit jam, it was so delicious!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Heavenly jams, especially the passion fruit jam. Scones when they are warm, they are so delecious with spreading the cream cheese on them. My son tried the Makarel rolls and they were very tasty too. I loved the place and its bakery smell. Highly recommended.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: The best place in Amsterdam for Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch or High Tea. A well kept secret by local Amsterdam is this amazing place. We had the Broodjes lunch -koud- arrangement as breakfast, which consists of bread, various spreads (ham, â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Will come back again just for the nice fruit jams and curds for breakfast.
But a place like this need better coffee and tea. Coffee was ok. Not fantastic. If you order tea- just make sure they give you enough tea leaf in the bag. I cannot believe they serve such ridiculously weak tea. Over all- a slightly pricey breakfast.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: There is a lot of space inside, so you can easily find free table. Most of all I liked apple pie. Very delicious.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best scones in town! Great taste and good variety of flavors. Moreover, the place is very clean, despite its touristic location. The customer service is good and very friendly.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
verry nice place with delicous food and prices that are amazing when you compare it to all the other tourist traps that demand 5â‚¬ for a croissant. the star is friendly the place is really cosy with jacket racks, news paper and glass roof.
lots of food is home made!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: A great place to enjoy a simple breakfast and a variety of baked goods. The apple pie wasnâ€™t the best Iâ€™ve had in Amsterdam - the apples were a bit crunchy. But overall, the atmosphere is cosy and the food was delicious.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Yummy food, lovely location and one of the cutest menus youâ€™ll ever see ğŸ˜

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: A man with grey hair rudely kicked me out for having spent only 15â‚¬ after 3 hours that I had walked in the bakery. There are many ways of telling things to people and he definitely did not choose the right one. I have lived in the â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great place to have breakfast or brunch. We absolutely loved it. Friendly staff and good food.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: One of the best breakfast of my life!! Really good food with a home touch!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Delicious handmade jam, wide choice of menu. My friends and I waited 20mins before sitting down,  definitely worth it.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Great place with a lot of breakfast and lunch options...
Very helpful and friendly staff.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: After a few years as a regular customer it is time to stop, say goodbye and search for a different bakery, where the level of arrogance, bad manners and so called ''being direct" performed by some staff members will be low or non existing.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: One of the most delicious Sandwiches I ever had. Only fresh and high quality ingredients. Perfect place for a long and relaxing breakfast/lunch or even lunch.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Good food, normal breakfast, loved the jam

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Lovely place to eat breakfast. friendly staff, yummy food, very pleasant and laid back atmosphere.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very friendly staff and good food

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very nice place with gread homemade food and friendly staff. Try the scones & curds/jams!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Food was good and the staff was friendly. The only downside was that the toilets were dirty. Apart from that I would recommend it!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Cozy and warm ambiance. Quiet spot in the middle of the town bustle. Kid friendly.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Had a Dutch breakfast for the first time â€” it was delicious, but I must say I've got a bit of a cheese overdose though. The waiter was very kind, and explained everything on the plate, including the right combinations. Oh, and the fresh juice! ğŸ‘Œ

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Good coffee, delicious pastries and even more delicious jam

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Cute place with delicious food and very welcoming and nice staff! Totally a must go in Amsterdam for a sweet break ğŸ’–

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: It is a very warm and cosy place, the best of it all was the wonderful smell of freshly, homemade bread and cakes. The lunch tasted good but was not very special, it did fill my stomach well! The staff is friendly and showed a heart for this place.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Delicious food but the staff was so rude that I wouldn't be going there again! Also beware, it's crazy crowded.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Perfect breakfast and wonderful staff!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Excellent place, friendly staff, super tasty homemade breakfast

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Went 4 times in 5 days.
Home made cooking, tasty and not too expensive

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: No nonsense, fresh-baked bread and scones, home made marmelade and cakes! Smells and tastes DE-LI-CIOUS!!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Food and drinks were great. A bit pricey to our opinion. Service friendly and welcoming. The only down point that really annoyed us was that they DID NOT agree to split our bill. :-(   I wanted to pay with card for my part and my friend with cash on her part but They refused to do so. Too bad

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Pumpkin's soup, traditional beer and good atmosphere. Everything is cosy!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Love the food they have here. I always tell myself to get something different when I visit, but I am a sucker for the Scones with clotted cream and the curds (especially lemon!).  Luckily my company always takes something different. We have â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Food was solid but wouldn't say it was mind-blowing (had the yogurt with homemade granola and spouse has the French breakfast). It's just a nice cafe with good bakery items. Seemed a little expensive (â‚¬9-13 for a basket of 3-5 bread items, some butter and jam, a cup of coffee or tea, and a small glass of juice) but not outrageously so.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Had a sandwich and a brownie. Both were good - but the brownie was especially like no other. It was not too sweet and had a strong hazelnut taste which I loved! The only downside was that there were no seats but I think I'll make myself a loyal customer. Everything homemade and super lekker!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very tasty breakfasts, very friendly service, but the hidden gem are the jams and curds! I've bought 4 jars for home and already need more after 2 weeks! So be sure you try them and you'll love them!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Good balance price/quality
and cozy interiors. We had the
Baker's Breakfast with fried eggs and was delicious. The fresh jams that came along, three, were also very tasty. It definitely deserves a visit for breakfast.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: The Dutch Breakfast menu is very good with delicious bread, cheese and homemade jams. The fruit shake served with the menu is also excellent. All for the price of 12,75â‚¬. The staff is also very nice.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Good location. A lot of variety in the menu. Need more effort in the cleaning. Portions is small though its consider expensive !! Anything more even extra bread you have to pay for it!! â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: This place provided a truly delicious breakfast in a lovely atmosphere.  The bread was amazing.  I could not be happier.  ( I rarely post or review, but my great experience here compelled me to do so. )

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very very good. The passion fruit jam was divine!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best freshly made homemade jam in Amsterdam. Strawberry jam, pineapple jam, pasionfruit jam, mango orange jam. Awesome indeed. Come in jar, eat as much as u can!! Coffee was excellent too. The elder waiter (maybe owner?) was excellent too, friendly and nice.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: We stood half an hour waiting to be seated in a queue that grew longer by the minute. Customers wouldn't stop going out, tables were empty but no one of the staff even turned to the us waiting. I had to rudely ask a waiter to attend us â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Hyped up by most blogs. It's simply a bakery with seating options. I'm sure the bread and pastry selection on its own is great but my boyfriend and I went for lunch to De Bakkerswinkel and weren't impressed. Waiting lines are long and the service very Dutch. I was incredibly excited for the scones but they didn't meet my expectations.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Nice food and atmosphere, helpful staff and not too pricy for Amsterdam standards for what you get.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: We came here for breakfast with a group of 10 after spending the night partying. The staff did everything to make it possible for us to sit together. The choice is huge and the quality is great, it was a perfect breakfast!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: This place was great! Our waitress was so nice! Beer and sandwiches were delicious! The carrot soup was excellent too! The desserts made daily by the chef's mom is a must!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: This was our first meal in Amsterdam - a short stroll from our hotel (Grand Amrath).  It was delicious - wonderful bread and pastries.  Cozy, cute and reasonable.  A great introduction to Dutch dining and a good spot to refuel, grab breakfast and coffee and fortify ourselves for walks around Amsterdam!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: The place has a lot of potential, and some of the staff are very nice, but one man with grey hair gave the worst customer service. He was incredibly rude and had the most terrible attitude. â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: I was there with my husband for a Sunday breakfast being the last day of our weekend trip to Amsterdam . I ordered eggs on toast with a cup of tea and I saw other tables having some jam so i figured we can help ourselves to some jam that â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Good location. A wide variety of choices in the menu both for food and beverages. However, service made clear that profitability and turnover were more important than the client. Customer always should come first and this ruined our experience in the cafe.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
The food is absolutely delicious! Friendly staff, nice ambience.
We had absolutely nothing to complain about :)

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Favourite little teatime shop in the city! Freshest baked goods ever. The scones and cheesecake are the best. Homemade jams and curd are to die for.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Get here for a breakfast! Delicious food and a rustic relaxed atmosphere.
No time to sit? Grab something from the bakery. Grab their brownies.
It seems they rather faced some kind of magic than the oven. Highly addictive.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Very nice place! Perfect for breakfast or light meals. They have incredible jams, of which I bought some on my way out!
Slow service, be patient!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: A great bakery/restaurant nestled in between a row of shops. Very friendly staff, all goods baked on site. Even the jams and lemon curd is homemade and extremely tasty. Would highly recommend.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Very tasty
Nice atmosphere

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Get the Veal Sausage Role! Mandalins we're great as well.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Amazing pastries, cakes and homemade jam. Everything is freshly made and the service ia lovely. I was impressed by the exquisite flavors. I can only recommend it!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Went for brunch and was delicious! I loved that they told you on the menu if the items were organic or not- I like the extra info. Staff was friendly, which was the opposite from what I was told to expect in the Netherlands.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Warm, personable service, excellent warm fresh scones, and the best hot chocolate o have tried in NL or Germany!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Nice breakfast spot in a central location. Lots of homemade breads, jams, and sweets. Breakfast was European with bread and jams but could add eggs. Yogurt and homemade granola was very good.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Such a great place for breakfast and brunch in the Netherlands. Lots of variations with homemade and superdelicious marmelades, juices, teas, quiche lorraine, dutch cheeses and breads. The only thing is that usually you have to wait in the â€¦

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great backery in the heart of the red light district. Mandatory: the scones!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: really nice brunch place, large and pleasant architecture and decoration, food was nice but not amazing.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Really beautiful place to have breakfast. Strongly recommend, especially homemade jams.
Friendly and nice personall.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Best bread in Amsterdam! Lovely staff and cosy atmosphere. Er h ad Breakfast and food var quickly. I can highly recommend eating here :)

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: It was great. Good and varied menu, great ingredients and a cozy place. The jams were amazing. Friendly service.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Over priced for what is essentially simple meals such as scrambled eggs and bacon; scones tasted stale. Food is average , ambience is relaxing and creative whilst price is too high

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Really friendly and helpful staff, the food is good. The menu on the chalkboard changes frequently which makes it great to visit every time again.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great service and excellent sandwiches.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great coffee, must try delicious spelt bread, and other varieties. Breakfast is very nice and jams that are offered are very lovely.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Extremely rude staff kicked us out for being there for 3 hours and not spending as much money as he thought we should spend

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Love this place everytime we come to Amsterdam we always visit.  Everything is made on site food always fresh, customer service spot on.  Couple of good gluten free options too

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Great place with fair food. Home cakes are good but more american pastries
A lot of choices and staff is really friendly
A good bakery to have a lunch or a brunch

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very friendly staff and very tasty homemade scones and jam. Although the service was a bit slow.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Beautiful place and great breakfast. Staff is very friendly and the jam they serve is out of this world!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great place, we had omelet for breakfast which was awesome. Service is a bit slow but overall was great.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Great food and service. The waitress was very patient telling us what's gluten-free.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Usually great, but this time the soup was luke warm and the bread was stale. Like the location at Westerpark more. The brownie was AMAZING though.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: This place does not disappoint. Everything they serve is awesome. Staff are a little uptight, perhaps because of the location and type of people visiting.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Still sitting in and I don't want to leave! Delicious homemade jam, bread and a pretty kind waiter. Awesome!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very nice place for breakfest. Homemade things like the rosin bread or the lemon jam are so delicious. It is a very cozy & Relaxing place. Advice!:-)

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Food is good; there was a shift change and our waiter went home and half of our order was forgotten - there was also a thumbprint in the dessert..

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Nice food, good quality but completely overpriced. They charge 80 cents for a glass of tapwater. Why...

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very nice and tasty quiche. Eating there more than a year, every time great meal, even for vegetarians

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: It has a surprising relaxing atmosphere in the busy streets of Amsterdam. Sandwiches are not typical and you have to be a fan to enjoy them.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: French toast breakfast with syrup was wonderful! The homemade jams were delicious!!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Nice and cosy cafe with a large assortment of home made bread and sweets. Very good and friendly service.

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text:
Recap and review of my 2018 trip:

Friendly staff but the food is pretty overhyped & over priced

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Amazing service, great atmosphere and delicious food with homemade jams!!!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Very good environment, good food and well served! The service was good and the staff is very efficient and friendly. Highly reccommend it!

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
Review Text: Menu is good ..Jams are amazing and do try the Lemon jam...A little pricey..You can buy the Jam on the way out...

Name: De Bakkerswinkel
